data.fullContent: U.S. and Cuban troops placed some 55,000 land mines across the "no man's land" around the perimeter of the naval base creating the second-largest minefield in the world, and the largest in the Western Hemisphere. On 16 May 1996, U.S. President Bill Clinton ordered the demining of the American field. They have since been replaced with motion and sound sensors to detect intruders on the base. The Cuban government has not removed its corresponding minefield outside the perimeter.
data.answer: 美国和古巴军队在该海军基地周围的“无人区”设置了大约5.5万枚地雷，形成了世界上第二大雷区，也是西半球最大的雷区。1996年5月16日，美国总统比尔·克林顿下令在美国境内清除地雷。它们已经被运动和声音传感器取代，用来探测基地上的入侵者。古巴政府还没有清除其周边相应的雷区。
